document_data.name: Uirkymbrand
document_data.mainbody:
'''Uirkymbrand''' was a [[Chosen of Mystra]] at some point long before the 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Yes! yes! Now I am First among [[Chosen of Mystra|Mystra's Chosen]]...and if they thought Elthaeris was overbearing, they'll learn well to kneel and quiver in fear beneath the spell-seizing scepter of Uirkymbrand! Hahahaha! The weak might just as well slay themselves right now, and yield their power to one more fitted to wield it...me!|Uirkymbrand, in a vision shown by Mystra to Elminster in {{yearlinkName|767}}}}
document_data.Personality: The man was self-aware about being very overbearing and not moralistic, instead being quite enthused about doing objectionable things unto others.
document_data.Description: In a vision revealed to [[Elminster Aumar]] by the goddess [[Mystra]] in 767 DR, Uirkymbrand was a bald man in red robes.
document_data.Possessions: Uirkymbrand had a crystal orb they used to scry, almost certainly a ''[[crystal ball]]'', and he mentioned a "spell-seizing scepter".
document_data.History: One of the Chosen of Mystra, Elminster Aumar, received a vision from the goddess in the {{YearlinkName|767}}. In the vision, the previous Chosen, Uirkymbrand, saw the death of a fellow Chosen, [[Elthaeris]], as cause for rejoicing, and began considering things he would be doing to weak people.
